item.title: 排序測試
item.description: 測試用的程式碼 wsort1.html {{/* {{ range .Site.Sections }} <h1>{{ .Name }} </h1> {{ $pages := partial "sort1.html" . }} {{ range $pages }} 🏷{{ .weight }} <br/> {{end}} {{ end }} */}} {{ $root := .Site.GetPage "hugonote" }} {{ $normal :=slice }} {{ range where $root.Pages "Kind" "page" }} {{ $weight := index (findRE "^.?([\\d][\\d|.]?[\\d|.]*)" .Title) 0 }} {{ $sw:=split $weight "."}} {{ $data := newScratch }} {{ $data.Set "tmp" "" }} {{ with $weight }} {{range $idx:=(seq 0 2) }} {{if lt $idx (len $sw) }} {{ $data.
